rules_text:
When Yoked Dromosaur enters the battlefield, create a Gladius Arms token. When you do, you may attach it to another target creature you control. [i](It’s an Equipment with “Equipped creature gets +2/-1” and equip {3}. Attaching an Arms to a creature unattaches any others.)[/i]
{1}, Sacrifice an artifact: Tap Yoked Dromosaur. It gains indestructible until end of turn.
